content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251992,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーー、なんか、むかつくが、まぁいい、お前なんか放置だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... this is really annoying, but whatever, I'll just ignore you."},{"lineNumber":251993,"originalJapaneseLine":"スライム迷宮の中を進んで行くと転移装置を発見する","translatedEnglishLine":"As we advanced through the slime labyrinth, we discovered a teleportation device."},{"lineNumber":251994,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス横断街道で使われている転移装置の一つ、ここからラグナロックアークへ入れる","translatedEnglishLine":"It's one of the teleportation devices used on the Zeth Crossroad Highway; from here, you can enter Ragnarok Arc."},{"lineNumber":251995,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、転移装置に入るぞ・・ぐいーーーん","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's enter the teleportation device... whoooosh."},{"lineNumber":251996,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの地下、王のみが入れる秘密通路","translatedEnglishLine":"Underground of Zeth, a secret passage that only the king can enter."},{"lineNumber":251997,"originalJapaneseLine":"扉が開いている、マジックが入って行っただ","translatedEnglishLine":"The door is open, Magic went inside."},{"lineNumber":251998,"originalJapaneseLine":"開けっ放しなのを見ると焦っているか余裕が無いか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing it left wide open suggests either they're in a hurry or don't have time to spare..."},{"lineNumber":251999,"originalJapaneseLine":"また契約の椅子ザカリテの元に居ると思う追いかけよう","translatedEnglishLine":"I think Magic is at the Contract Chair Zakalite again, let's follow."},{"lineNumber":252000,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、マジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Magic."},{"lineNumber":252001,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテと討論している、契約が違うじゃない","translatedEnglishLine":"She is arguing with Zakalite, saying the contract isn't right."},{"lineNumber":252002,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は魔人メディウサを倒して欲しいから貴方を呼び出したのに","translatedEnglishLine":"I summoned you because I want you to defeat the demon Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252003,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてメディウサを倒す契約をしたはずよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"And we made a contract that you would defeat Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252004,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、君はランスとやらがピンチとするとそこにいる魔物将軍を倒して欲しいと","translatedEnglishLine":"However, you told me that if Rance is in trouble, you want me to defeat the demon general there."},{"lineNumber":252005,"originalJapaneseLine":"言ったでは無いか、だから私は約束を遂行した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Didn't you say that? So I fulfilled the promise."},{"lineNumber":252006,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはそうだけど、それで私の魂を奪うなんて、釣り合わないわ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's true, but taking my soul for that is disproportionate."},{"lineNumber":252007,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人倒して、魔人メディウサを倒して","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat a demon, defeat the demon Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252008,"originalJapaneseLine":"わがまま言うねー君","translatedEnglishLine":"You're being selfish, aren't you?"},{"lineNumber":252009,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は迷宮を進む、途中でルーシーの話","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others proceed through the labyrinth; along the way, Lucy talks."},{"lineNumber":252010,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス建国時、パセリが契約の椅子を使った事、それによりパセリの魂は","translatedEnglishLine":"When Zeth was founded, Paseri used the Contract Chair, and as a result Paseri's soul was..."},{"lineNumber":252011,"originalJapaneseLine":"捕らわれてしまった、私は助けたかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Captured. I wanted to save him."},{"lineNumber":252012,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、モシカシタ、アルテシアもそれを使ってしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, maybe Artesia also used it."},{"lineNumber":252013,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人メディウサが前に攻めてきた時、それで使われたはず","translatedEnglishLine":"When the demon Medusa attacked before, it should have been used then."},{"lineNumber":252014,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時、アルテシアは魂をかけてメディウサ退治を依頼したはずなのだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, Artesia supposedly put her soul on the line and requested Medusa be defeated."},{"lineNumber":252015,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは遂行されていない","translatedEnglishLine":"But that wasn't carried out."},{"lineNumber":252016,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、マジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Magic."},{"lineNumber":252017,"originalJapaneseLine":"我が儘な王様だね、しかたない、特別だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"A selfish king, huh? It can't be helped; it's special."},{"lineNumber":252018,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに君の魂は先の魔物将軍を倒す事で７日後らもらう事になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"You are already set to receive your soul back seven days after defeating the previous demon general."},{"lineNumber":252019,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、追加で魔人メディウサを倒してあげよう","translatedEnglishLine":"But, additionally, I will let you defeat the demon Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252020,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただし追加の代償として、今この瞬間、即日で魂は渡してもらおう。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, as additional payment, you must give me your soul immediately, at this very moment."},{"lineNumber":252021,"originalJapaneseLine":"それて今死ぬって事","translatedEnglishLine":"That means you die now."},{"lineNumber":252022,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだよ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right."},{"lineNumber":252023,"originalJapaneseLine":"（くくくく、魔人メディウサとやりあうなんてごめんだよ、嘘だよ","translatedEnglishLine":"(Heh heh heh, I don't wanna fight the demon Medusa, that's a lie."},{"lineNumber":252024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　契約さえ完了してそく魂をもらえばもう私のいいなりだからね）","translatedEnglishLine":" Once the contract is complete and I get the soul, she'll be under my control.)"},{"lineNumber":252025,"originalJapaneseLine":"さぁ、この契約を結びと言いなさい","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, say you agree to this contract."},{"lineNumber":252026,"originalJapaneseLine":"（※　立ち絵の追加が可能なら、幽霊パセリも出したい所です","translatedEnglishLine":"(* If possible to add character portraits, I'd like to show Ghost Paseri as well."},{"lineNumber":252027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　ザカリテと契約してずっと使われている存在、マジックに対して","translatedEnglishLine":"A being who has been the contract servant of Zakalite all along, towards Magic."},{"lineNumber":252028,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　可哀想、その契約をしては駄目と思っても口に出して言えずに","translatedEnglishLine":"It's pitiful; even though they think that contract shouldn't be made, they cannot voice it."},{"lineNumber":252029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　もどかしい思いをしている）","translatedEnglishLine":"They feel frustrated.)"},{"lineNumber":252030,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスとの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation with Felice."},{"lineNumber":252031,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪魔と人間の契約についていろいろ・・設定的な事","translatedEnglishLine":"Various things about contracts between demons and humans... setting stuff."},{"lineNumber":252032,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテはハグレ悪魔、こういうのが何体か居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Zakalite is a renegade demon; there are several like him."},{"lineNumber":252033,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らは人の願いを吸い取って力にする","translatedEnglishLine":"They absorb human wishes and turn them into power."},{"lineNumber":252034,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は・・ハグレ悪魔にはなれない、ハグレになれるのは上級悪魔だけ","translatedEnglishLine":"I... can't become a renegade demon; only high-class demons can become renegades."},{"lineNumber":252035,"originalJapaneseLine":"それなり独立してやれる力がある者ね","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who have enough power to act independently."},{"lineNumber":252036,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックと契約の椅子","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic and the Contract Chair."},{"lineNumber":252037,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにランスが現れる、ちょっとまったー","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance appears there, saying 'Wait a minute!'"},{"lineNumber":252038,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルーシーは過去にパセリを騙された恨みがあるので今度は止めて見せる意気込み","translatedEnglishLine":"Lucy holds a grudge because Paseri was deceived in the past; this time, she's determined to stop it."},{"lineNumber":252039,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんらかの討論、その契約に異議あり無効だとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Some kind of debate, objecting to the validity of that contract..."},{"lineNumber":252040,"originalJapaneseLine":"最終的には力付くで倒すと戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"Eventually, it leads to fighting by force."},{"lineNumber":252041,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスも少し会話に入ってもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps Felice can join the conversation a little as well."},{"lineNumber":252042,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞契約の椅子ザカリテ　と戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight Contract Chair Zakalite."},{"lineNumber":252043,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテが消滅した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zakalite has vanished."},{"lineNumber":252044,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックに書かれていた数字も消えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The numbers that were written on Magic also disappeared."},{"lineNumber":252045,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、悪魔を倒すと契約は消えるのだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, when you defeat a demon, the contract disappears."},{"lineNumber":252046,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうよ、実は私もランスを倒せばランスとの主従契約は消えるのだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right. Actually, if I defeat Rance, the master-servant contract with him would also disappear."},{"lineNumber":252047,"originalJapaneseLine":"げっ、まさか・・俺様の命を狙っているのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, no way... are they aiming for my life?"},{"lineNumber":252048,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、こんなそんなでマジックは救われた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, in any case, Magic was saved."},{"lineNumber":252049,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうして邪魔するのよ、私の命で魔人メディウサを倒せたらそれで十分なのに","translatedEnglishLine":"Why do you interfere? It would be enough if I could defeat the demon Medusa with my life."},{"lineNumber":252050,"originalJapaneseLine":"お父さんを殺した、ゼスの人々をいっぱい殺した、ランスも危険だし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Killed my father, killed many people of Zeth, and Rance is dangerous too..."},{"lineNumber":252051,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、だからと・・と泣きながら言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"So, so... she says while crying."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーー、なんか、むかつくが、まぁいい、お前なんか放置だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... this is really annoying, but whatever, I'll just ignore you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム迷宮の中を進んで行くと転移装置を発見する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As we advanced through the slime labyrinth, we discovered a teleportation device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス横断街道で使われている転移装置の一つ、ここからラグナロックアークへ入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's one of the teleportation devices used on the Zeth Crossroad Highway; from here, you can enter Ragnarok Arc.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、転移装置に入るぞ・・ぐいーーーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's enter the teleportation device... whoooosh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの地下、王のみが入れる秘密通路
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Underground of Zeth, a secret passage that only the king can enter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 扉が開いている、マジックが入って行っただ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The door is open, Magic went inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けっ放しなのを見ると焦っているか余裕が無いか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing it left wide open suggests either they're in a hurry or don't have time to spare...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また契約の椅子ザカリテの元に居ると思う追いかけよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think Magic is at the Contract Chair Zakalite again, let's follow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテと討論している、契約が違うじゃない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is arguing with Zakalite, saying the contract isn't right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は魔人メディウサを倒して欲しいから貴方を呼び出したのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I summoned you because I want you to defeat the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてメディウサを倒す契約をしたはずよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And we made a contract that you would defeat Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、君はランスとやらがピンチとするとそこにいる魔物将軍を倒して欲しいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, you told me that if Rance is in trouble, you want me to defeat the demon general there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ったでは無いか、だから私は約束を遂行した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't you say that? So I fulfilled the promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはそうだけど、それで私の魂を奪うなんて、釣り合わないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's true, but taking my soul for that is disproportionate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人倒して、魔人メディウサを倒して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat a demon, defeat the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わがまま言うねー君
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're being selfish, aren't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は迷宮を進む、途中でルーシーの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others proceed through the labyrinth; along the way, Lucy talks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス建国時、パセリが契約の椅子を使った事、それによりパセリの魂は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Zeth was founded, Paseri used the Contract Chair, and as a result Paseri's soul was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕らわれてしまった、私は助けたかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captured. I wanted to save him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、モシカシタ、アルテシアもそれを使ってしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, maybe Artesia also used it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサが前に攻めてきた時、それで使われたはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the demon Medusa attacked before, it should have been used then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、アルテシアは魂をかけてメディウサ退治を依頼したはずなのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Artesia supposedly put her soul on the line and requested Medusa be defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは遂行されていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that wasn't carried out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が儘な王様だね、しかたない、特別だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A selfish king, huh? It can't be helped; it's special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに君の魂は先の魔物将軍を倒す事で７日後らもらう事になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are already set to receive your soul back seven days after defeating the previous demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、追加で魔人メディウサを倒してあげよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, additionally, I will let you defeat the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし追加の代償として、今この瞬間、即日で魂は渡してもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, as additional payment, you must give me your soul immediately, at this very moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それて今死ぬって事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That means you die now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （くくくく、魔人メディウサとやりあうなんてごめんだよ、嘘だよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Heh heh heh, I don't wanna fight the demon Medusa, that's a lie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約さえ完了してそく魂をもらえばもう私のいいなりだからね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once the contract is complete and I get the soul, she'll be under my control.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、この契約を結びと言いなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, say you agree to this contract.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※　立ち絵の追加が可能なら、幽霊パセリも出したい所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (* If possible to add character portraits, I'd like to show Ghost Paseri as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテと契約してずっと使われている存在、マジックに対して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A being who has been the contract servant of Zakalite all along, towards Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可哀想、その契約をしては駄目と思っても口に出して言えずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's pitiful; even though they think that contract shouldn't be made, they cannot voice it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もどかしい思いをしている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They feel frustrated.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスとの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Felice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔と人間の契約についていろいろ・・設定的な事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various things about contracts between demons and humans... setting stuff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテはハグレ悪魔、こういうのが何体か居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakalite is a renegade demon; there are several like him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは人の願いを吸い取って力にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They absorb human wishes and turn them into power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は・・ハグレ悪魔にはなれない、ハグレになれるのは上級悪魔だけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... can't become a renegade demon; only high-class demons can become renegades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなり独立してやれる力がある者ね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who have enough power to act independently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックと契約の椅子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and the Contract Chair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが現れる、ちょっとまったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance appears there, saying 'Wait a minute!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーシーは過去にパセリを騙された恨みがあるので今度は止めて見せる意気込み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lucy holds a grudge because Paseri was deceived in the past; this time, she's determined to stop it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの討論、その契約に異議あり無効だとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of debate, objecting to the validity of that contract...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終的には力付くで倒すと戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eventually, it leads to fighting by force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスも少し会話に入ってもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps Felice can join the conversation a little as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞契約の椅子ザカリテ　と戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight Contract Chair Zakalite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテが消滅した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakalite has vanished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックに書かれていた数字も消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The numbers that were written on Magic also disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、悪魔を倒すと契約は消えるのだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, when you defeat a demon, the contract disappears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうよ、実は私もランスを倒せばランスとの主従契約は消えるのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. Actually, if I defeat Rance, the master-servant contract with him would also disappear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: げっ、まさか・・俺様の命を狙っているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, no way... are they aiming for my life?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、こんなそんなでマジックは救われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, in any case, Magic was saved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして邪魔するのよ、私の命で魔人メディウサを倒せたらそれで十分なのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why do you interfere? It would be enough if I could defeat the demon Medusa with my life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんを殺した、ゼスの人々をいっぱい殺した、ランスも危険だし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Killed my father, killed many people of Zeth, and Rance is dangerous too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、だからと・・と泣きながら言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, so... she says while crying.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

from here, you can enter Ragnarok Arc."},{"lineNumber":251995,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、転移装置に入るぞ・・ぐいーーーん","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's enter the teleportation device... whoooosh."},{"lineNumber":251996,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの地下、王のみが入れる秘密通路","translatedEnglishLine":"Underground of Zeth, a secret passage that only the king can enter."},{"lineNumber":251997,"originalJapaneseLine":"扉が開いている、マジックが入って行っただ","translatedEnglishLine":"The door is open, Magic went inside."},{"lineNumber":251998,"originalJapaneseLine":"開けっ放しなのを見ると焦っているか余裕が無いか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing it left wide open suggests either they're in a hurry or don't have time to spare..."},{"lineNumber":251999,"originalJapaneseLine":"また契約の椅子ザカリテの元に居ると思う追いかけよう","translatedEnglishLine":"I think Magic is at the Contract Chair Zakalite again, let's follow."},{"lineNumber":252000,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、マジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Magic."},{"lineNumber":252001,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテと討論している、契約が違うじゃない","translatedEnglishLine":"She is arguing with Zakalite, saying the contract isn't right."},{"lineNumber":252002,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は魔人メディウサを倒して欲しいから貴方を呼び出したのに","translatedEnglishLine":"I summoned you because I want you to defeat the demon Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252003,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてメディウサを倒す契約をしたはずよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"And we made a contract that you would defeat Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252004,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、君はランスとやらがピンチとするとそこにいる魔物将軍を倒して欲しいと","translatedEnglishLine":"However, you told me that if Rance is in trouble, you want me to defeat the demon general there."},{"lineNumber":252005,"originalJapaneseLine":"言ったでは無いか、だから私は約束を遂行した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Didn't you say that? So I fulfilled the promise."},{"lineNumber":252006,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはそうだけど、それで私の魂を奪うなんて、釣り合わないわ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's true, but taking my soul for that is disproportionate."},{"lineNumber":252007,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人倒して、魔人メディウサを倒して","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat a demon, defeat the demon Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252008,"originalJapaneseLine":"わがまま言うねー君","translatedEnglishLine":"You're being selfish, aren't you?"},{"lineNumber":252009,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は迷宮を進む、途中でルーシーの話","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others proceed through the labyrinth; along the way, Lucy talks."},{"lineNumber":252010,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス建国時、パセリが契約の椅子を使った事、それによりパセリの魂は","translatedEnglishLine":"When Zeth was founded, Paseri used the Contract Chair, and as a result Paseri's soul was..."},{"lineNumber":252011,"originalJapaneseLine":"捕らわれてしまった、私は助けたかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Captured. I wanted to save him."},{"lineNumber":252012,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、モシカシタ、アルテシアもそれを使ってしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, maybe Artesia also used it."},{"lineNumber":252013,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人メディウサが前に攻めてきた時、それで使われたはず","translatedEnglishLine":"When the demon Medusa attacked before, it should have been used then."},{"lineNumber":252014,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時、アルテシアは魂をかけてメディウサ退治を依頼したはずなのだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, Artesia supposedly put her soul on the line and requested Medusa be defeated."},{"lineNumber":252015,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは遂行されていない","translatedEnglishLine":"But that wasn't carried out."},{"lineNumber":252016,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、マジック","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Magic."},{"lineNumber":252017,"originalJapaneseLine":"我が儘な王様だね、しかたない、特別だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"A selfish king, huh? It can't be helped; it's special."},{"lineNumber":252018,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに君の魂は先の魔物将軍を倒す事で７日後らもらう事になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"You are already set to receive your soul back seven days after defeating the previous demon general."},{"lineNumber":252019,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、追加で魔人メディウサを倒してあげよう","translatedEnglishLine":"But, additionally, I will let you defeat the demon Medusa."},{"lineNumber":252020,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただし追加の代償として、今この瞬間、即日で魂は渡してもらおう。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, as additional payment, you must give me your soul immediately, at this very moment."},{"lineNumber":252021,"originalJapaneseLine":"それて今死ぬって事","translatedEnglishLine":"That means you die now."},{"lineNumber":252022,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだよ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right."},{"lineNumber":252023,"originalJapaneseLine":"（くくくく、魔人メディウサとやりあうなんてごめんだよ、嘘だよ","translatedEnglishLine":"(Heh heh heh, I don't wanna fight the demon Medusa, that's a lie."},{"lineNumber":252024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　契約さえ完了してそく魂をもらえばもう私のいいなりだからね）","translatedEnglishLine":" Once the contract is complete and I get the soul, she'll be under my control.)"},{"lineNumber":252025,"originalJapaneseLine":"さぁ、この契約を結びと言いなさい","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, say you agree to this contract."},{"lineNumber":252026,"originalJapaneseLine":"（※　立ち絵の追加が可能なら、幽霊パセリも出したい所です","translatedEnglishLine":"(* If possible to add character portraits, I'd like to show Ghost Paseri as well."},{"lineNumber":252027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　ザカリテと契約してずっと使われている存在、マジックに対して","translatedEnglishLine":"A being who has been the contract servant of Zakalite all along, towards Magic."},{"lineNumber":252028,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　可哀想、その契約をしては駄目と思っても口に出して言えずに","translatedEnglishLine":"It's pitiful; even though they think that contract shouldn't be made, they cannot voice it."},{"lineNumber":252029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　もどかしい思いをしている）","translatedEnglishLine":"They feel frustrated.)"},{"lineNumber":252030,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスとの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation with Felice."},{"lineNumber":252031,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪魔と人間の契約についていろいろ・・設定的な事","translatedEnglishLine":"Various things about contracts between demons and humans... setting stuff."},{"lineNumber":252032,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテはハグレ悪魔、こういうのが何体か居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Zakalite is a renegade demon; there are several like him."},{"lineNumber":252033,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らは人の願いを吸い取って力にする","translatedEnglishLine":"They absorb human wishes and turn them into power."},{"lineNumber":252034,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は・・ハグレ悪魔にはなれない、ハグレになれるのは上級悪魔だけ","translatedEnglishLine":"I... can't become a renegade demon; only high-class demons can become renegades."},{"lineNumber":252035,"originalJapaneseLine":"それなり独立してやれる力がある者ね","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who have enough power to act independently."},{"lineNumber":252036,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックと契約の椅子","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic and the Contract Chair."},{"lineNumber":252037,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにランスが現れる、ちょっとまったー","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance appears there, saying 'Wait a minute!'"},{"lineNumber":252038,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルーシーは過去にパセリを騙された恨みがあるので今度は止めて見せる意気込み","translatedEnglishLine":"Lucy holds a grudge because Paseri was deceived in the past; this time, she's determined to stop it."},{"lineNumber":252039,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんらかの討論、その契約に異議あり無効だとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Some kind of debate, objecting to the validity of that contract..."},{"lineNumber":252040,"originalJapaneseLine":"最終的には力付くで倒すと戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"Eventually, it leads to fighting by force."},{"lineNumber":252041,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスも少し会話に入ってもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Perhaps Felice can join the conversation a little as well."},{"lineNumber":252042,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞契約の椅子ザカリテ　と戦う","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight Contract Chair Zakalite."},{"lineNumber":252043,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザカリテが消滅した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zakalite has vanished."},{"lineNumber":252044,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックに書かれていた数字も消えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The numbers that were written on Magic also disappeared."},{"lineNumber":252045,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、悪魔を倒すと契約は消えるのだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see, when you defeat a demon, the contract disappears."},{"lineNumber":252046,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうよ、実は私もランスを倒せばランスとの主従契約は消えるのだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right. Actually, if I defeat Rance, the master-servant contract with him would also disappear."},{"lineNumber":252047,"originalJapaneseLine":"げっ、まさか・・俺様の命を狙っているのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, no way... are they aiming for my life?"},{"lineNumber":252048,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、こんなそんなでマジックは救われた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, in any case, Magic was saved."},{"lineNumber":252049,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうして邪魔するのよ、私の命で魔人メディウサを倒せたらそれで十分なのに","translatedEnglishLine":"Why do you interfere? It would be enough if I could defeat the demon Medusa with my life."},{"lineNumber":252050,"originalJapaneseLine":"お父さんを殺した、ゼスの人々をいっぱい殺した、ランスも危険だし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Killed my father, killed many people of Zeth, and Rance is dangerous too..."},{"lineNumber":252051,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、だからと・・と泣きながら言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"So, so... she says while crying."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーー、なんか、むかつくが、まぁいい、お前なんか放置だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... this is really annoying, but whatever, I'll just ignore you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スライム迷宮の中を進んで行くと転移装置を発見する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As we advanced through the slime labyrinth, we discovered a teleportation device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス横断街道で使われている転移装置の一つ、ここからラグナロックアークへ入れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's one of the teleportation devices used on the Zeth Crossroad Highway; from here, you can enter Ragnarok Arc.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、転移装置に入るぞ・・ぐいーーーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's enter the teleportation device... whoooosh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの地下、王のみが入れる秘密通路
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Underground of Zeth, a secret passage that only the king can enter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 扉が開いている、マジックが入って行っただ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The door is open, Magic went inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けっ放しなのを見ると焦っているか余裕が無いか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing it left wide open suggests either they're in a hurry or don't have time to spare...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また契約の椅子ザカリテの元に居ると思う追いかけよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think Magic is at the Contract Chair Zakalite again, let's follow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテと討論している、契約が違うじゃない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is arguing with Zakalite, saying the contract isn't right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は魔人メディウサを倒して欲しいから貴方を呼び出したのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I summoned you because I want you to defeat the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてメディウサを倒す契約をしたはずよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And we made a contract that you would defeat Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、君はランスとやらがピンチとするとそこにいる魔物将軍を倒して欲しいと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, you told me that if Rance is in trouble, you want me to defeat the demon general there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ったでは無いか、だから私は約束を遂行した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't you say that? So I fulfilled the promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはそうだけど、それで私の魂を奪うなんて、釣り合わないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's true, but taking my soul for that is disproportionate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人倒して、魔人メディウサを倒して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat a demon, defeat the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わがまま言うねー君
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're being selfish, aren't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は迷宮を進む、途中でルーシーの話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others proceed through the labyrinth; along the way, Lucy talks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス建国時、パセリが契約の椅子を使った事、それによりパセリの魂は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Zeth was founded, Paseri used the Contract Chair, and as a result Paseri's soul was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕らわれてしまった、私は助けたかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captured. I wanted to save him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、モシカシタ、アルテシアもそれを使ってしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, maybe Artesia also used it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メディウサが前に攻めてきた時、それで使われたはず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the demon Medusa attacked before, it should have been used then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、アルテシアは魂をかけてメディウサ退治を依頼したはずなのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Artesia supposedly put her soul on the line and requested Medusa be defeated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは遂行されていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that wasn't carried out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マジック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が儘な王様だね、しかたない、特別だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A selfish king, huh? It can't be helped; it's special.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに君の魂は先の魔物将軍を倒す事で７日後らもらう事になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are already set to receive your soul back seven days after defeating the previous demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、追加で魔人メディウサを倒してあげよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But, additionally, I will let you defeat the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし追加の代償として、今この瞬間、即日で魂は渡してもらおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, as additional payment, you must give me your soul immediately, at this very moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それて今死ぬって事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That means you die now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （くくくく、魔人メディウサとやりあうなんてごめんだよ、嘘だよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Heh heh heh, I don't wanna fight the demon Medusa, that's a lie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約さえ完了してそく魂をもらえばもう私のいいなりだからね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once the contract is complete and I get the soul, she'll be under my control.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、この契約を結びと言いなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, say you agree to this contract.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※　立ち絵の追加が可能なら、幽霊パセリも出したい所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (* If possible to add character portraits, I'd like to show Ghost Paseri as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテと契約してずっと使われている存在、マジックに対して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A being who has been the contract servant of Zakalite all along, towards Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可哀想、その契約をしては駄目と思っても口に出して言えずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's pitiful; even though they think that contract shouldn't be made, they cannot voice it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もどかしい思いをしている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They feel frustrated.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスとの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Felice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔と人間の契約についていろいろ・・設定的な事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various things about contracts between demons and humans... setting stuff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテはハグレ悪魔、こういうのが何体か居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakalite is a renegade demon; there are several like him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは人の願いを吸い取って力にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They absorb human wishes and turn them into power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は・・ハグレ悪魔にはなれない、ハグレになれるのは上級悪魔だけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... can't become a renegade demon; only high-class demons can become renegades.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなり独立してやれる力がある者ね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who have enough power to act independently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックと契約の椅子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic and the Contract Chair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにランスが現れる、ちょっとまったー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance appears there, saying 'Wait a minute!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーシーは過去にパセリを騙された恨みがあるので今度は止めて見せる意気込み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lucy holds a grudge because Paseri was deceived in the past; this time, she's determined to stop it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの討論、その契約に異議あり無効だとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some kind of debate, objecting to the validity of that contract...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終的には力付くで倒すと戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eventually, it leads to fighting by force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスも少し会話に入ってもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps Felice can join the conversation a little as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞契約の椅子ザカリテ　と戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight Contract Chair Zakalite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザカリテが消滅した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zakalite has vanished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックに書かれていた数字も消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The numbers that were written on Magic also disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、悪魔を倒すと契約は消えるのだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, when you defeat a demon, the contract disappears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうよ、実は私もランスを倒せばランスとの主従契約は消えるのだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. Actually, if I defeat Rance, the master-servant contract with him would also disappear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: げっ、まさか・・俺様の命を狙っているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, no way... are they aiming for my life?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、こんなそんなでマジックは救われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, in any case, Magic was saved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして邪魔するのよ、私の命で魔人メディウサを倒せたらそれで十分なのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why do you interfere? It would be enough if I could defeat the demon Medusa with my life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お父さんを殺した、ゼスの人々をいっぱい殺した、ランスも危険だし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Killed my father, killed many people of Zeth, and Rance is dangerous too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、だからと・・と泣きながら言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, so... she says while crying.
